content.title: Add Custom Properties to the Component
content.body:
1. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Templates explorer, expand Components and select the userEntry.emailField component.
  2. From the upper-right corner of Iris, in the Properties panel, go to the Component tab, and click Manage Properties.
  3. From the Manage Properties window, select the Custom tab, and click the Add icon .
  4. Modify the values of the following properties:
    • Property Name: minCharlength
    • Display Name: Minimum Character Length
    • Property Type: Integer
    • Default Value: 3
    • Group: General
    • Read / Write: Write
  5. Click Apply.
